poem:
### Discord in the Air

In the shadow of policy,  
where greed whispers  
and the earth trembles beneath  
a world deceived;  
the voice of doubt  
rises, hollow, against  
the choir of truth,  
old hands stirring dust  
while nature weeps,  
her silence louder  
than their empty claims.  
We are what we sow:  
only understanding can harvest peace.
